title: 用什么指令可以把液体禁止流动？
author: sbk

replies.txt_content: 先挖一层，每个方块上都要放水，再向下挖

replies.author: sbk
replies.txt_content:
297362179 发表于 2012-7-9 17:13 
先挖一层，每个方块上都要放水，再向下挖
指令啊。。。。。。。。。。

replies.author: sylqiuyifeng
replies.txt_content:
sbk 发表于 2012-7-9 18:33 
指令啊。。。。。。。。。。
如果有领地
/res set flow false

replies.author: sbk
replies.txt_content:
sylqiuyifeng 发表于 2012-7-9 18:33 
如果有领地
/res set flow false
整个服务器的水啊。很多服务器不是多把流动水禁掉了吗？那是怎么弄的？

replies.txt_content:

基础插件貌似也得.....不知道，我忘了....

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
在使用ESS插件的前提下，essentials配置文件
plugins\Essentials\config.yml文本编辑器（不推荐记事本）打开：


  # General physics/behavior modifications
  prevent:
    lava-flow: true
    water-flow: true
    water-bucket-flow: false
    fire-spread: true
    lava-fire-spread: true
    flint-fire: false
    lightning-fire-spread: true
    portal-creation: false
    tnt-explosion: false
    tnt-playerdamage: false
    fireball-explosion: false
    fireball-fire: false
    fireball-playerdamage: false
    creeper-explosion: false
    creeper-playerdamage: false
    creeper-blockdamage: false
    enderdragon-blockdamage: true
    enderman-pickup: false
    villager-death: false
